amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to increase wages for American workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1038 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 122.

action.text: Amendment SA 1038 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Kirk. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2006; text: CR S1996) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to increase wages for American workers.
